field.label: Upload Default Logo
field.comment: JPG,PNG,GIF,SVG

field.label: Lazy Loading icon
field.comment: Selected image display as loading icon.

field.label: Lazy Threshold
field.comment: By default images are loaded when they appear on the screen. If you want images to load earlier use threshold parameter. Setting threshold to 200 causes image to load 200 pixels before it appears on viewport.

field.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
field.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of product images (height of each image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to "No", Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

field.label: Image Width
field.comment: Set width image in page products list.

field.label: Image Height
field.comment: Set height image in page products list.

field.label: Min Height
field.comment: Set height image layzy load.

field.label: Alternative Image
field.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the main image.

field.label: Select Alternative Image By Attribute
field.comment: Which attribute from product images will be used to select an alternative image.

field.label: Alternative Image Attribute Value
field.comment: Specify the attribute value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alternative Image By Attribute is set to "Sort Order", specify the number of product image which will mark the alternative image, for example: 2.

field.label: Number of Columns
field.comment: Number of products displayed in a single row.

field.label: Number of Columns - Tablet
field.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 1200 px and 1439 px.

field.label: Number of Columns - Tablet
field.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 768 and 1199 px.

field.label: Number of Columns - Mobile
field.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 767 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

field.label: Use One Image Height
field.comment: SCALE PRODUCT IMAGES

field.label: Image height. Value in pixel.
field.comment: integer

field.label: Product container image height. Value in pixel.
field.comment: integer

field.label: Infinite Scroll Buffer (px)
field.comment: The higher the buffer the easier,during scrolling, addition products will be loaded. Only use when Infinite Scroll is selected as the paging type.

field.label: Load More Button Text
field.comment: Change the button text.

field.label: Load More Post Text
field.comment: Change the text that is displayed on the button while the posts/products are being loaded.

field.label: Google API Key
field.comment: Get key: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

group.label: Product Page
group.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the product page columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three main columns (Image Column, Primary Column, Secondary Column) in a single row,
sum of these three columns has to be equal 12 grid units (for example: 4 + 5 + 3).

field.label: Product Page Layout
field.comment: Choose style.

field.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
field.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of product images (height of each image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to "No", Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

field.label: Main Image Width
field.comment: Set main width image in product detail.

field.label: Main Image Height
field.comment: Set height image in page products details.

field.label: Thumb Image Width
field.comment: Set thumb width image in page products detail, height of the images will be calculated automatically based on width and ratio.

field.label: Image Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Primary Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Secondary Column Width
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Lower Primary Column Width
field.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

field.label: Lower Secondary Column Width
field.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

field.label: Position Related
field.comment: Position of related products block. Position will be ignored if option "Related Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

field.label: Position Upsell
field.comment: Position of upsell products block. Position will be ignored if option "Related Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

group.label: Product Sliders
group.comment: This section is related to product sliders. "Speed" will be applied for all existing product sliders, also on product page. Other settings are only applied to Featured Products Slider blocks and New Products blocks.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the product sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

field.label: Speed
field.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation.

field.label: Move Items
field.comment: Number of items that should move on animation. Enter 0 to move all visible items.

group.label: Product Quickview
group.comment: This section is related to Product Quickview.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
field.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Configuration Scope
field.comment: Imported configuration settings will be applied to selected scope (selected store view or website). If you're not sure what is 'scope' in Magento system configuration, it is highly recommended to leave the default scope 'Default Config'. In this case imported configuration will be applied to all existing store views.

field.label: Hover Button Background Color
field.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

field.label: Hover Button Border Color
field.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

field.label: Basic Font Size
field.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

field.label: Font Family
field.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

field.label: Custom
field.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif.
Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

field.label: Google Fonts
field.comment:
Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts
Important: most of the fonts from Google are not available in all weights. Make sure that you specified correct weight (field Font Weight below) for selected font. Otherwise font will not be displayed. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

field.label: Character Sets
field.comment:
Some of the fonts support multiple scripts (like Latin and Cyrillic for example). You need to select at least one character set.
Important: not all fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets refer to Google Web Fonts.
Important: using multiple character sets affects performance, so only select the character sets that you actually need.

field.label: Font Weight
field.comment:
Specify the weight of the font. You can only use numeric font weights which are available for the CSS property font-weight. E.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.
Important: if you selected a font from Google Fonts, note that some fonts are not available in all weights. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

field.label: Side Padding
field.comment: Add padding to the left and right side of inner container of all sections of the page. Leave empty to use default value. Specify value in pixels.

field.label: Font Size
field.comment: Top-level items

field.label: Uppercase
field.comment: Top-level items

group.label: Main Content
group.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main content area - section of the page located between the header and the footer.

field.label: Top Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap above the main section of the page. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.comment: Specify additional gap below the main section of the page. Value in pixels.

field.label: Top Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Bottom Padding
field.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

field.label: Side Padding
field.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.
